title: ‘I’m sorry, but it’s too late’: Doctor says dying COVID patients ask for vaccine before intubation
content:
1. ‘I’m sorry, but it’s too late’: Doctor says dying COVID patients ask for vaccine before intubation  WGHP FOX 8 Greensboro
  2. ‘I’m sorry, but it’s too late’: Alabama doctor on treating unvaccinated, dying COVID patients  AL.com
  3. 'I'm sorry, but it's too late' - unvaccinated patients beg for shot; new infections nearly triple in two weeks: COVID news  USA TODAY
  4. 'It's too late': Doctor forced to turn down COVID patients begging for vaccine  New York Post
  5. Doctor Heartbroken After Having to Tell Dying COVID Patients 'It's Too Late' to Receive the Vaccine  Yahoo Entertainment
